name: Farmfall [GGJ2023 Entry]
description:
Farmfall is a 2.5D Isometric Puzzle Platformer created for Global Game Jam 2023. The theme was "Roots". 

A short arcade style game about a large, overgrown carrot that destroyed a farm! You are a rabbit farmer who must get to the *root* of the problem by finding all the small carrots and excavating to the base of the big carrot! If you can find it before anyone else, you'll eat well for the rest of your life!

Who Made the Game?

  •  JDSherbert (All Code and Audio)
    Twitter: https://twitter.com/JDSherbert_
    Github: https://github.com/JDSherbert GGJ: https://globalgamejam.org/users/jdsherbert

  • Amysaurus (All Art)
    Twitter: https://twitter.com/amysaurus121
    Itch: https://amysaurus.itch.io/
